actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: To confirm certain contracts for preschool and early childhood services entered into by the Secretary of the Interior through the Bureau of Indian Affairs.

summary.text: Confirms certain contracts for preschool and early childhood services entered into by the Secretary of the Interior with Indian tribes which involve funds under the Education of the Handicapped Act.

titles.title: To confirm certain contracts for preschool and early childhood services entered into by the Secretary of the Interior through the Bureau of Indian Affairs.
